content: लक्षित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [लक्ष्-क्त] {@--1@} Seen, observed, marked, beheld. {@--2@} Denoted, indicated. {@--3@} Characterized, marked, distinguished. {@--4@} Defined. {@--5@} Aimed at. {@--6@} Indirectly expressed, indicated, hinted at. {@--7@} Inquired into, examined. {@--8@} Considered, regarded.
